section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 6. Chapter 6: Diseases of the Nervous System > b. Pain - Category G89 > 4) Chronic pain

content.full_text: Chronic pain is classified to subcategory G89.2. There is no time frame defining when pain becomes chronic pain. The provider's documentation should be used to guide use of these codes. (Evidence: pg no: 48, L59-L61)
content.summary: Guidelines for chronic pain classification using G89.2 subcategory, emphasizing provider documentation over time frames for determining chronicity. (Evidence: pg no: 48, L59-L61)
